name: Museum Game
description:
The Museum Game is a first-person puzzle game in which you have to navigate through an art museum. However, there is something special about the art museum. Certain paintings are able to transport you into the world it depicts when you touch them.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Platform: PC

Engine: Unreal Engine 4

Duration: November 2021 - December 2021

# of Developers: 7

My Role: Level Designer & 3D Modeller
